title: MANDATORY TOOL USE. You must call tools and not...

content.text: MANDATORY TOOL USE. You must call tools and not answer until tool execution is complete. 1) Call edit with path '/tmp/codetether_morph_e2e_direct2.txt', instruction 'append GAMMA line', update 'append GAMMA line at end'. 2) Then call confirm_edit with confirm=true using path/old_string/new_string from prior edit metadata. 3) After confirmation respond DONE.
